Title: A Sacred Connection
Description:
Aye, the stormrook is beginning to take a liking to us. But the bond between rider and gryphon is forged over many trials.

Ye may have the spirit of the storm, but let's show how ye mastered it. Time to really prove yer mettle in battle.
ObjectivesText: Collect 500 Storm Spirits by slaying powerful creatures of the Dragon Isles.

Objectives.Text: Collect Storm Spirits from creatures of the Dragon Isles
